alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Lac qui Parle (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 3:02PM CDT until May 09 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR EASTERN LAC QUI PARLE AND NORTHWESTERN CHIPPEWA COUNTIES... At 301 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Milan, or 11 miles northwest of Montevideo, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Lac qui Parle and northwestern Chippewa Counties, including the following locations... Big Bend City and Lac Qui Parle State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
